knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```


```{r}
source <- read_csv("results.csv")
source_long <- pivot_longer(source, "NV+V-NV":"V-V", names_to = "condition", values_to = "accuracy")
```
```{r}
ggplot(source_long, aes(x = condition, y = accuracy)) + geom_boxplot()
```
